Text.Page:
One of the Frontera merchants, a fellow named Safna, has broken the quarantine and run out the north gate.

Ask {@LinkCreature:75#1012#Junith}. He may know where he's going.

Safna? Don't get me started. I told him we're quarantined, but he knocked me down and ran right past me. I chased him, but he had too good a head start. Last I saw him he was headed to Feral Valley.

You can look for him, but you'll probably find nothing but bones.

I won't go back. That swindling decurion, Jeulile, agreed to gather some rare mushrooms for me, but when her messenger brought them, they weren't the ones I asked for. They were poisonous!

I told him, but he said he was acting on her orders.

I'm going straight to Feral Valley to give her a piece of my mind and deliver this letter of complaint!

Of course, it is pretty dangerous out here..."I'll deliver it for you."

You will? Well, if you insist...and you seem pretty trustworthy.

Tell her come plague, panthers, or anything else, she'll be sorry if she cheats me again!
Poisonous mushrooms? I'm afraid someone must have made a terrible mistake. I'm sorry you had to get involved.
